items.headline: ‘Billions’ in Medicare waste? Read the fine print.
items.summary_en: Yet another investigation into federal government spending has found that “waste, fraud and abuse” is a lot less than some people say.

items.headline: SoundHound earnings show a growing embrace of voice AI, and the stock is surging
items.summary_en: The company beat revenue expectations by a wide margin, with a CEO saying that businesses large and small are turning to AI for voice-based customer service offerings.

items.headline: Trade Desk’s stock tumbles after earnings. Are investors being too harsh?
items.summary_en: The ad tech company failed to deliver meaningful upside with its outlook and announced a change at CFO, but results for the latest quarter beat expectations.

items.headline: Instacart says its grocery partners are starting to ‘embrace more competitive pricing,’ as demand forecast tops estimates
items.summary_en: Shares of Instacart rallied late Thursday after the grocery-delivery app’s forecast for a key demand metric came in above Wall Street’s estimates.

items.headline: Live Nation’s second quarter was mixed. It’s still hoping to ride massive shows, more upsells to a record year.
items.summary_en: The company plans to invest in new venues, with more of an emphasis on hospitality.

items.headline: Good news for media companies is proving to be bad news for their stocks
items.summary_en: Warner Bros. Discovery reported strong results Thursday, but the stock extended its recent weakness. The same thing happened to Walt Disney’s stock the day before.

items.headline: Krispy Kreme’s meme-stock ride is over. The stock is tumbling as losses widen.

items.headline: Block’s stock pops after earnings, as its two financial engines reignite
